function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Systematic underreporting not affecting estimates for the effects of policy","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of the effects of policy on contagious disease propagation","Mitigation":"Implement rigorous monitoring and verification processes to ensure accurate reporting of contagious disease data","Technologies":"Data validation and verification tools","People":"Policy makers, public health officials","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Changes in testing regimes over space and time biasing infection growth rates","Impact":"Bias in the estimation of infection growth rates due to changes in testing capacity","Mitigation":"Regularly calibrate infection growth rate estimation methods to account for changes in testing capacity","Technologies":"Calibration models, data analysis tools","People":"Epidemiologists, data scientists","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Temporal underreporting generating sizable biases in estimated effects of anti-contagion policies","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of the effects of anti-contagion policies due to temporal underreporting","Mitigation":"Implement real-time monitoring of disease surveillance to identify and address temporal underreporting","Technologies":"Real-time surveillance systems, predictive analytics tools","People":"Public health officials, data analysts","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"}]}
